game.name: Windscape
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play TV, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In Windscape you play as a young girl living on your parents’ farm, set in a lovely world made up of floating islands in the sky. As you discover the world you learn that something has gone terribly wrong - islands are breaking apart and falling from the sky!
game.shortDescriptionEn: In Windscape you play as a young girl living on your parents’ farm, set in a lovely world made up of floating islands in the sky. As you discover the world you learn that something has gone terribly wrong - islands are breaking apart and falling from the sky!

reviewHighlights.text: 끔찍하게도 이 게임은 도전과제가 터졌습니다. 그런데 저는 어떻게 100% 달성이냐고요? 보실 분이 있으려나 모르겠지만.... 얼리액세스 버전으로 다운그레이드하면 당신도 가능합니다. * 다음을 참고 하세요. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfi...
